weight: - 690 g - 780 g with battery and memory card
isosensitivity: ISO 100 to 6400 in steps of 1/3 or 1/2 EV (manually extendable up to ISO 25600)
dimensions: 132 x 105 x 77 mm (H x W x D)
accessoriesincluded: - Rechargeable Li-ion battery EN-EL15 - Battery charger MH-25 - Camera strap AN-DC1 - USB cable - Audio video cable
cleaning: - Image Sensor Cleaning - Image Dust Off reference data (optional Capture NX 2 software required)
otherfeatures: - Twin SD memory card slots - 2,016 pixel RGB metering sensor - Fast response: 0.052-second shutter-release time lag - Durable design with magnesium alloy top and rear covers
